The video was shared on Facebook on Febr: 2020, and has been viewed more than 1700 times.
The video shows a person sitting on a pl: freeing a bird trapped on a power line.
The claim was debunked as false: as the video has been circulating in media reports since at least 2013 about a bird rescue operation carried out by a utility company in the US state of Virginia.
The video was also shared on multiple so: including Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube, with similar claims.
